p: Santalum album oil also has been found to be active against many Gram-positive strains of bacteria, including Staphylococcus, including strains resistant to MRSA and VRSA antibiotics, Streptococcus and some Gram-negative bacteria [ 6]. In studies by Kačániová et al. [ 8], Amyris balsamifera oil exhibited strong antibacterial activity, and SAO possessed a moderate inhibition effect against Staphylococcus spp.
